marketing-text: Fungura isoko yamakuru ya COVID19. Ikibaho cyambere hamwe niyagurwa rya mushakisha hamwe nibisobanuro birambuye REST API, yegereye indimi zose.
name: Izina
promo-message: Byakozwe nurukundo ❤️ nitsinda kuri Hoobu.com. Tegura urugendo rwawe nyuma yicyorezo nonaha hamwe nigikorwa cyacu cyiza-gihe cyo gufatanya gutegura urugendo
general-advice-wash-hands-description: Karaba intoki zawe kenshi kandi mumasegonda 20 ukoresheje isabune namazi nyuma yo guhumeka izuru, inkorora cyangwa kwitsamura na mbere yo kurya cyangwa gufata ibiryo. Gukaraba intoki neza nuburyo bwiza cyane bwo kwica virusi.
general-advice-minimise-contact-descript: Mugabanye amateraniro adakenewe & ingendo hanyuma ushake ubundi buryo bwo kuramutsa nko guhana amaboko, guhobera cyangwa gusomana.
general-advice-avoid-face-description: Amaboko arashobora gufata virusi byoroshye kandi bimaze kwanduzwa, amaboko arashobora kwanduza virusi mumaso yawe, izuru cyangwa umunwa. Kuva aho, virusi irashobora kwinjira mumubiri wawe ikagutera indwara.
general-advice-be-hygienic-description: Gupfuka umunwa n'amazuru ukoresheje inkokora yawe yunamye cyangwa ingirangingo mugihe ukorora cyangwa unyeganyega, hanyuma uhite ujugunya imyenda yakoreshejwe ako kanya.
general-advice-self-isolate-description: Niba urwaye ibicurane nkibimenyetso ugomba kwigunga wenyine nkigikorwa cyo kwirinda kandi ukirinda ibyago byo gukwirakwiza indwara muguma murugo.
